text: Bozo the Clown is an American children's character, on the television show: Bozo: The World's Most Famous Clown, that entertained kids throughout the 1950's until 2001. Portrayed by: * Pinto Colvig (1946-1954) * Larry Harmon (1959-1992) * Vance Colvig (1959) * Bill Britten (1959) * Frank Avruch (1959-1970) * Bob Bell (1960-1984) * Joey D'Auria (1984-2001) * Wandeko Pipoca (Brazil) (1979-1982) Category:Clowns
title: Bozo the Clown
